text:
I used getRealPath in a jsp page and I found a problem :

application.getRealPath("/computers/w600.txt") 
--> null

application.getRealPath("/computers/ww600.txt") --> 
H:\jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1\webapps\audit\computers\ww600.txt

application.getRealPath("/computers/i600.txt") --> 
H:\jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1\webapps\audit\computers\i600.txt

I don't know why W char isn't handled correctly
creator: jean-pascal.laux@ispatunimetal.com

text:
I tried this with Tomcat 3.2.1 and 3.2.2b3 and worked fine.  If your still
seeing this problem, could you supply a small sample webapp that demonstrates the
failure?  Thanks.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
